name: HomeGrown (erika_hg, JDev121, Matthew.Eriksen, kyliejo71, L Watson, Kat_Trap)
name_original: HomeGrown (erika_hg, JDev121, Matthew.Eriksen, kyliejo71, L Watson, Kat_Trap)
description:
Welcome to the world of plants!

Home Grown is relaxing and wholesome simulation game, where you run a daycare for plant children. Shake out your roots and get ready to take care of some tots.  

Description:

Parents have dropped up their children for the day. It is up to you to ensure they are happy and healthy. At the start of each day, you choose what kids to accept. Throughout the day the kids will need different things from you. Your job is to keep them as happy as possible before they leave. At the end of the day, you can see how you did and learn more about each kiddo.

 

Development Information:

We are Vivarium, a group of seven students from DePaul University. We have been working on this game for approximately eighteen weeks. We envisioned a realizing and brightly colored game: visually we drew inspiration from Slime Rancher, and mechanically we sought to capture the simplicity of Animal Crossing and Nintendogs.

This game is still in the process of being made, but we will post updates and the latest builds here!  Meet the Team

Justin DeVries - Sound Lead

Katherine Dusanic - Design

Matt Eriksen - Technical Art, Design

Erika Hong - Art, Design

Zhiyi Jiang - Sound

Special shout out to our amazing playtesters! And of course, Timmy Jimmy.
